subsc: Other social services,General public administration sector,General finance sector,General education sector,Health
trustfund:
TF040631-ARGENTINA: GENDER ISSUES IN THE
            CORDOBA PROVINCE REFORM LOAN,TF034286-LAC REGION - REVIEW OF GENDER ISSUES

abstracts.cdata!:
The Cordoba Provincial Reform Loan
            Project aims at narrowing the serious poverty incidence in
            the Province, where despite national average per capita
            incomes, significant gaps in the delivery of health,
            education, and social protection persist. The project will
            support fiscal and structural reforms in the social sectors,
            to provide basic health coverage to non-insured, indigent
            populations, while the education component will redirect
            spending towards schools in poorer neighborhoods, providing
            special retention programs, to reduce drop-out rates among
            children from poorer families. The project will also focus
            on improved delivery of social assistance, and protection
            services within the context of general fiscal balance.
